entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Lillooet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:38 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lillooet 07:00 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023
Temperature: 3.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 62 %
Dewpoint: -3.2°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming north 40 km/h gusting to 60 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 10.
